txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Coarse skin from the beasts near Trestlebridge. Deliver the items to Guardsman Otley in the town of Trestlebridge.
'These skins will be put to good use - perhaps as shoes for those who have none. Thank you.'

'Leather can be used for armour, but the skins of beasts can be used for more minor repairs. If you can get skins from the beasts immediately surrounding Trestlebridge we will find a way to make use of them.'
Men of Bree Task: Coarse Skin
Guardsman Otley, in Trestlebridge, is awaiting delivery of coarse skin.
Deliver the coarse skin to Guardsman Otley at Trestlebridge
You have been tasked with collecting coarse skin from the beasts near Trestlebridge.\n\nYou can deliver the items to Guardsman Otley at Trestlebridge.
Wanted: Coarse skin from the beasts near Trestlebridge.
